Hard sigmoid activation function.

@description
It is defined as:

`0 if x < -2.5`, `1 if x > 2.5`, `(0.2 * x) + 0.5 if -2.5 <= x <= 2.5`.

# Examples
```{r}
x <- k_array(c(-1., 0., 1.))
k_hard_sigmoid(x)

x <- as.array(seq(-5, 5, .1))
plot(x, k_hard_sigmoid(x),
     type = 'l', panel.first = grid(), frame.plot = FALSE)
```

@returns
A tensor with the same shape as `x`.

@param x
Input tensor.
